law.text:
A licensed veterinary practitioner is immune from any civil liability that results from:
The actions of a licensed acupuncturist that practices in accordance with § 2-301(g)(11) of the Agriculture Article;
The actions of a person that:
Is licensed, certified, or otherwise authorized to practice a health occupation under the Health Occupations Article; and
Is authorized to practice the health occupation on an animal in accordance with § 2-304 of the Agriculture Article; or
A report in good faith of suspected animal cruelty to a local law enforcement or county animal control agency under § 2-304(f) of the Agriculture Article.
